channel.title: Substitute for Frozen Cars
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
We have some bigger kiddos on our list and are no longer able to purchase the Frozen (https://www.walmart.com/ip/Disney-Frozen-Convertible-Car-6-Volt-Battery-Powered-Ride-On/37312935) cars, as they have been discontinued. Has anyone else successfully wired a car that is about the size of the Frozen 6 volt? Thank you in advance!

item.title: Substitute for Frozen Cars
item.dc:creator: CamiOsier
item.description:
Great! Thank you both. We have heard that Disney Lightning McQueen by Huffy is another viable option (https://goo.gl/Tim6vd).

Read full topic

item.title: Substitute for Frozen Cars
item.dc:creator: Bill_Janes
item.description:
I haven’t gotten into the wiring yet, but the Disney Princess Mercedes 6-volt is almost identical to the frozen, just Pepto pink. I have one in the office; will try to verify that the wiring is the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Substitute for Frozen Cars
item.dc:creator: gavin.wood
item.description:
We are getting ready to hold a community build in November and we are working to find a car to replace the Frozen car. We like the Maseratis, but they are a little on the small side (but bigger than the little Lightning McQueen cars). We’ll put together a manual and post it in #manuals-and-guides once we decide what to do with the kids that are over about 3 years old. We’re thinking about a Jeep, but they are bigger. I’ll try to keep you posted once we make a final decision.

Read full topic
